output: html_notebook

all columns should have same mode(character,numeric etc.) and same length.**cbind** function is used to combine columns into a matrix.

## matrix form

```{r}
x=c(1,2,0.9)
y=c(4,0.5,6)
z=c(0.7,8,9)
mymatrix=cbind(x,y,z)
mymatrix
```
## dimension
```{r}
dim(mymatrix)
```
## correlation
```{r}
cor(mymatrix)
```
## use subscripts to identify rows and columns
```{r}
mymatrix[3,]
```
```{r}
mymatrix[2,3]
```
```{r}
mymatrix[1:2,2:3]
```
## note- similar to matrices, we have another data type called **ARRAY**
## array has more than two dimensions
